org.tagaprice.core.entities
Class ProductRevision

java.lang.Object
  org.tagaprice.core.entities.ProductRevision
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
@Entity
public class ProductRevision
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class represents a specific revision of a product. For every new revision of a product, such a ProductRevision is added to the set of ProductRevisions of the Product.

A ProductRevision has the following properties:

  • Id: primary identifier in the database of the associated Product and part of the identifier in the database for this ProductRevision
  • revisionNumber: revision number and part of the identifier in the database
  • title: name of the product
  • createdAt: Date this revision was created
  • creator: Account who created this revision
  • unit: Unit in which this product is measured
  • amount: amount in which this product is sold
  • category: a Category this product is associated with
  • imageURL: the location of a picture of this product, as it is (normally) sold

TODO This class may should be immutable.

Author:
haja, forste

Constructor Detail

ProductRevision

public ProductRevision(java.lang.Long id,
                       java.lang.Integer revisionNumber,
                       java.lang.String title,
                       java.util.Date createdAt,
                       Account creator,
                       Unit unit,
                       java.lang.Double amount,
                       Category category,
                       java.lang.String imageURL)
Initialize a new ProductRevision.

Parameters:
id - Id of the associated product. Can be null if the associated Products id is null. TODO check this condition, maybe this can always be null?
revisionNumber - Revision number of this product. To create a new revision of a product, this must be set to (<value of old revision of product> + 1). If this product is new, this must be set to 1.
title - Name of the product.
createdAt - Date this revision was created.
creator - Account who created this revision.
unit - Unit in which this product is measured.
amount - Amount in which this product is sold.
category - Category this product is associated with. May be null if no category is assigned.
imageURL - The location of a picture of this product, as it is (normally) sold. TODO can this be null?
